*Convenience*
At The Buchanan, youll enjoy the convenience of a 24/7 concierge, on-site management, and a
live-in super. Our package locker and secure mail room make deliveries a breeze and our laundry room in the basement is available for your convenience. 

*Dermot Ignite Club and Community* 
When youre ready to unwind, enjoy the benefits of a Dermot property exclusive - Dermot Ignite,
a vibrant, socially interactive community. Enjoy specially crafted events like the Summer Concert Series, which takes place every Thursday during the summer months and provides our residents with performances from local musicians across a variety of genres. Additionally, Dermot Ignite offers cocktail mixology classes, wellness sessions, happy hours, and more all managed in-house by top professionals. Plus, every amenity area is equipped with free Wi-Fi.

Discover a lifestyle that is rich with engaging activities and connectivity at The Buchanan! 

*Dermot Ignite Fit*
The Dermot Ignite Fit facility features cardio and strength studios where you will find top-of-the-line equipment with free weights up to 100lbs, a squatting rack, a cycling studio, a rowing machine, ellipticals, treadmills, and more. Dermot Ignite offers weekly fitness programming for our residents to connect and stay active. 

*Dermot Ignite Lounge*
The Dermot Ignite lounge is the perfect place to work, unwind, and gather with friends and neighbors. Whether its staying productive on the large, booth-style work tables during the day or catching a game on the big screen in the evening, our cozy residents lounge extends the comforts of your Buchanan home. 

*The Central Courtyard*
Blending pre-war architecture with contemporary styling, The Buchanans large, private courtyard is the perfect spot for working from home in the fresh air, getting to know your neighbors, or enjoying exclusive Dermot Ignite events.

*Dermot Ignite Dog Spa*
To ensure both you and your pet feel at home at the Buchanan, we have a fully stocked washing station for use whenever its time to get your pup fresh and clean.

*Our Neighborhood*
The Buchanan is set in the heart of Turtle Bay, a classic Manhattan neighborhood tucked between the East River and Midtown. Rich in history, it is home to the United Nations, the Chrysler Building, and Grand Central Terminal, among other internationally recognized icons. Just a few blocks from the energy of the Midtown business district, Turtle Bays residential streets are filled with a variety of upscale restaurants and lounges and bordered by a lush waterfront park. All parts of the city and tri-state region are accessible via nearby subways and trains. With prime Midtown just a few blocks away, many of the citys premier corporate towers and luxury shopping destinations are close at hand.

Rising 32 stories above 42nd Street between 1st and 2nd Avenues, Woodstock Tower is a pre-war, landmarked masterpiece built in 1929 by renowned developer Fred F. French. Originally designed for hotel and pied- -terre use, it was converted to cooperative apartments in 1980. As the tallest and arguably the most distinguished building in the Tudor City complex, Woodstock Tower is celebrated for its elegant Tudor architecture, stepped terraces, and sweeping views of the East River and New York City skyline.

Woodstock Tower blends timeless elegance with modern conveniences, offering a serene, community-oriented lifestyle in the heart of Midtown Manhattan.

Enjoy stunning north-facing views of the East River and Manhattan skyline from this renovated high-floor studio in the iconic Woodstock Tower, located in the heart of Tudor City.

title: 15 West 53rd Street #15E
description:
Welcome to Residence 15E, a masterfully renovated, expansive turn-key one-bedroom condominium that offers exceptional scale, refined proportions, and a flexible layout designed for sophisticated living. This spacious apartment offers a flexible layout, where the vast living room can be effortlessly converted to create a second bedroom or private home office.
 
Set within the iconic Museum Tower, one of New York City’s most distinguished full-service condominiums, this residence exudes quiet tasteful and modern elegance. Immediately adjacent to the Museum of Modern Art, the building lives up to its name, blending timeless architectural design with contemporary luxury. 
 
Upon entering the apartment, a gracious foyer sets a tone of quiet distinction, leading into a magnificent square-shaped living room nearly 22 by 19 feet, with soaring ceilings and dramatic proportions. The living space is framed by a wall of windows spanning 20 feet, half of which are floor-to-ceiling, bathing the interior in natural light and framing captivating views of Midtown’s architectural skyline. The stunning walnut herringbone flooring throughout further enhances the home’s mid-century modern character.
 
The windowed galley kitchen is both sleek and functional, featuring Carrara marble countertops, terracotta tile flooring, and top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances including a Liebherr refrigerator, wall-mounted oven, and separate cooktop.
The oversized primary suite is a serene retreat, privately located down a gallery-style hallway. It comfortably accommodates a king-sized bed and offers abundant storage, including a walk-in closet and a secondary wardrobe. The en-suite bathroom is appointed with travertine stone finishes, a floating vanity, chrome fixtures, a deep soaking tub, offering a spa-like experience in the comfort of home.
 
Additional highlights include a stylish powder room clad in travertine, oversized closets throughout, and the potential to install an in-unit washer/dryer. The apartment is pet-friendly, and Museum Tower permits washer/dryers within units. Building amenities are second to none: a state-of-the-art fitness center with sauna, media and entertaining room, a wine-tasting lounge, and a beautifully landscaped roof terrace overlooking MoMA’s renowned sculpture garden. Additional services include valet, laundry, and optional housekeeping. A live-in resident manager ensures personalized attention at every level.

Located in the vibrant heart of Midtown, Museum Tower places you mere steps from Central Park, Rockefeller Center, Carnegie Hall, and New York’s premier shopping, dining, and cultural destinations.

Rising 33 stories, with Central Park to the East and the iconic Lincoln Center to the West, 30 Lincoln Plaza has it all. Residence 19B is a high-floor, one-bedroom, one-bathroom home offering the best of Manhattan living with top-tier amenities and world-class convenience just outside your door-including Equinox, Morton Williams, and the iconic Smith & Wollensky.

Designed by Sydness Architects and completed in 2010, The Alexander offers 24-hour concierge service, cold storage for grocery deliveries, a fully renovated fitness center, and a landscaped roof terrace with panoramic skyline views.

With Grand Central Terminal just blocks away and many subway lines nearby, commuting is seamless.

title: 200 West 54th Street #PHH
description:
Rarely available, custom, triple-mint one-bedroom penthouse with a landscaped private terrace. This space is the perfect combination of luxury and location—a must-see! Rent includes monthly housekeeping.

Residents enjoy a partial view of the New Year's Eve ball drop above the bustle of Times Square.

Apartment features include 12-foot ceilings, ebonized hardwood floors, central air conditioning, steam heat, and light pouring in from every window with custom wooden blinds. A spacious kitchen and living area, which open up to a beautifully landscaped terrace, make this a perfect indoor/outdoor space for entertaining. The kitchen is fully equipped with state-of-the-art stainless steel appliances, including a Miele dishwasher, a 34-inch Sub-Zero refrigerator, a four-burner industrial Viking range with convection oven and Viking hood, a built-in Toshiba commercial-grade microwave, and a built-in U-Line wine cellar. Custom-built kitchen cabinets, all equipped with under-counter lights, white Italian marble countertops, and a generously sized island cut from a single white marble slab, complete the kitchen.

The living room has custom-built bookshelves with drawers and cabinets and a 55-inch TV. The bathroom is all white Italian marble with a glass walk-in shower door, a steam shower, and a patio door from the shower to the terrace, creating an outdoor shower.

Tons of storage are cleverly designed throughout this mint-condition penthouse apartment. A Bosch washer/dryer is concealed behind closed doors in the bathroom. The bedroom has a large double-hanging walk-in closet and custom-built-ins on each side of the queen-sized bed, with pocket doors that provide complete privacy.

This stylish penthouse is situated in a beautiful pre-war, full-service building in the heart of Midtown. Located directly across the United Nations and moments from Grand Central, the East River Ferry, and multiple subway lines, this residence offers exceptional convenience, world-class amenities, and some of the most iconic views in the city.

No pets please.

title: 516 West 47th Street #S2C
description:
Appointments must be requested in advance for all open houses.

Welcome to Apartment S2C at 516 West 47th Street, a quiet and bright alcove condo Studio, in an amenity stacked building in Hell's Kitchen.

In Excellent Condition, this delightful unit has new wood flooring and oversized windows that offer the unit an abundance of light. In the bedroom alcove, there is an extended, double-deep large closet with the Elfa Closet System. The kitchen has full-sized stainless steel appliances including over the range microwave, new dishwasher, granite counters and great cabinet space. The bathroom has radiant heated bathroom floors with a huge medicine cabinet and triple mirror vanity. Apartment S2C faces the courtyard making it a very quiet apartment.

Built in 2006, Clinton West is a full service, low-rise building featuring a gorgeous Greenhouse Lounge with flat-screen TV and free wi-fi where you can relax with your friends or meet your neighbors and watch a game together. You can have your own party there or attend one of the seasonal parties thrown by the building. Enjoy the furnished courtyard with putting green, 2 central laundry rooms, elevators, 24/7 DM/concierge, super, camera security. Oh, and save on a GYM membership as there is a great gym in the building. This is a pet free unit.

Hell's Kitchen is a vibrant residential area that just keeps getting better. You will appreciate quick access to the theater district, Lincoln Center, and the midtown business center. It's a 6 minute quick walk to the nearest subway entrance at 44th and 8th and there are several bus lines even closer. Ride your bike, scooter, walk/jog, or picnic along the promenade of the Hudson River Park. Restaurants are popping up every day and a branch of the famous Sullivan Street bakery is on the block. Target, Gotham West Market land the Amish Market, are all a short walk from Clinton West. Enjoy all the area has to offer including trendy restaurants and lovely mom and pop shops.

title: 21 West End Avenue #3209
description:
*OCCUPIED HOME - AT LEAST 48 HOUR NOTICE REQUIRED TO TOUR*

This is a corner 3 bedroom with southern/eastern exposure.

21 West End is the pioneer luxury rental building in Lincoln Square. Located on West End Avenue between 60th and 61st Streets, 21 West End rises 48 stories above Lincoln Square. With striking views of the city skyline and Hudson River, the residences offer a wide range of studio to three bedroom layouts, designed by SLCE Architects. The amenities at 21 West End are unprecedented. A 24-hour concierge, bar and caf, dog park, playroom and workshop offer convenience to all residents. The fitness center includes over 60,000 SF of actively programmed exercise space, in addition to a yoga room, boxing studio and 60-foot indoor pool and spa. The building features ample entertaining space, including a lounge with outdoor terrace, club room, golf simulator, screening room, library and wine tasting room, plus more.

NOW OFFERING SECURITY DEPOSIT REPLACEMENT THROUGH THE GUARANTORS!

*Lifestyle Amenities*

*Convenience*
At 21 West End, youll enjoy the convenience of a 24/7 concierge, on-site management, and a live-in super. Our package room and in-house valet services, including Wash & Fold, Dry Cleaning, and housekeeping, ensure effortless living. Discover the exceptional lifestyle that awaits you at 21 West End!

*Dermot Ignite Club & Community*
When you're ready to unwind, enjoy the benefits of a Dermot property exclusive - Dermot Ignite, a vibrant, socially-interactive community. Enjoy specially crafted events like game nights, cocktail mixology classes, wellness sessions, happy hours, movie screenings, and more all managed in-house by top professionals. Plus, every amenity area is equipped with free Wi-Fi. Discover a lifestyle rich with engaging activities and connectivity at 21 West End!

*Dermot Ignite Fit & Pool*
The Dermot Ignite Fit facility features a yoga studio, kickboxing room, and state-of-the-art exercise machines, including Peloton Bikes, a Smith Machine, Stairmaster, and more. The indoor pool is an active retreat for the whole family, offering restorative hot baths, a sauna, and lounge space for adults. Its also a fun place for the kids to play and watch movies on the built-in cinema screen. Enjoy a comprehensive fitness and relaxation experience at 21 West End.

*Dermot Ignite Lounge & Dermot Ignite Play*
The spacious Residents Lounge with its vaulted ceilings invites our members to generous seating and study/workspace for all to enjoy. For the younger generation, the indoor playscape is home to a larger-than-life stegosaurus that is sure to get the kids pumped! Soft surfaces, fun shapes, and bright colors create a year-round social space and home base during rainy days. Even better, low-lying windows built into the bookshelves look into the dog run for fun peekaboo moments for both the pups and kids!

*Dermot Ignite Rooftop*
The rooftop terrace is your private backyard, ideal for gatherings with friends and neighbors, featuring grills, heaters, lounge seating, and a lawn with stunning Hudson River views. Inside, enjoy a full demo kitchen perfect for hosting catered private events. Become the ultimate host in this exceptional space!

*Dermot Ignite Multi-purpose Room, Wine Cellar & Golf Simulator*
Enjoy wine tastings and access to climate-controlled lockers in our exclusive wine cellar. Perfect your swing with our golf simulator and entertain guests in the private club room or dining room with a hosting kitchen for your next dinner party.

*Dermot Ignite Dog Spa & Dog Run*
The indoor dog spa and dog run are amazing areas for rainy days and cold winter weather. Doggie Daycare is offered during the weekdays for your 4-legged companions to make friends of their own!

*Our Neighborhood*
Our neighborhood offers incredible convenience and charm our unspoken amenity. With Harry's Table and Empellon Taqueria just across the street, you have a plentitude of dining options. Youre sure to enjoy the proximity to Riverside and Central Parks, Lincoln Center, and high-end shopping at The Apple Store, Time Warner Center, Trader Joes, Zabars, Lululemon, and Whole Foods. Plus, Columbus Circle's nearby subway lines, which (1, A, C, B, D) provide easy access to the entire city.

The wine cellar hosts tastings and has climate-controlled lockers for resident use. There is a golf-simulator, a private club room, and a private dining room with a hosting kitchen for your next dinner party.

*Dermot Ignite Dog Spa & Dog Run*
The indoor dog spa and dog run are amazing areas for rainy days and cold winter weather. Doggie Daycare is offered during the weekdays for you 4-legged companions to make friends of their own!

*Our Neighborhood*
The neighborhood is our unspoken amenity. Right across the street is Harrys Table, and Empellon Taqueria for a lovely lunch or dinner experience. Both Riverside and Central Parks, Lincoln Center, and the multitude of high-end shopping and retail including The Apple Store, Time Warner Center, Trader Joe's, Zabar's, Lululemon, and Whole Foods. The Tate welcomes residents home to the ultimate Chelsea apartment building. These luxury NYC rental apartments, designed by Rockwell Group to have a powerful and immediate connection to nature, feature a lobby with sunlit bamboo trees, rich limestone floors, and windowed elevator lobbies overlooking a serene courtyard garden. With its bold take on luxury and attention to detail, The Tate is located in the heart of the gallery district, one of Manhattan's most vibrant and exciting neighborhoods.

This is a three-bedroom, three-bath home with sweeping views of New York City. This beauty features double balconies in the apartment, two en-suite bathrooms, plus a guest bathroom. Top-of-the-line appliances including Bosch washer and dryer. The center of the home features an entertaining kitchen with an extra-large island.

Soaring above Manhattan sits Anagram NoMad, apartments designed with purpose. Both a part of the environment and a place to escape from the hustle and bustle, enjoy hotel-style amenities with the comfort of home. Step inside to look out at unparalleled views of Manhattan, or turn your attention inward and appreciate unmatched design, comfort, and convenience. Anagram NoMad offers residents top-of-the-line amenities with everything at their doorstep including :

24-Hour Doorman
The Top: Indoor and outdoor rooftop lounge with unbroken views in every direction.
The Gymnasium: A fitness center that will run rings around the typical at-home gym.
The Library: The go-to destination for contemplation and research.
The Office: A workspace with none of the drawbacks of having to go somewhere.
The Cafe: A resident-only cafe, partnered with Breads Bakery.
The Playhouse: A kid's room designed to engage the imagination, complete with nooks and padded flooring and its very own playhouse.
The Green: An eddy from the busy stream of the city, an open enclave to let in some of the world around, but equally to stop and take it all in.

In NoMad, enjoy a rich blend of every facet of life, industry, entertainment, food and drink, and shopping, NoMad is the city at its most potent and comprehensive; a city at the center of the city. Life here is tailored around you, whichever angle you choose.
